column3: Tourism;Phnom Penh: On the evening of March 8
column5: a (*Polish?) woman was standing under the bridge in Chbar Ampov and told people that she had been robbed.------The unidentified woman held a sign asking for help along the road under Monivong Bridge
column7: Chbar Ampov district at 4:20 pm on March 8
column9: as people who asked for information were told that she had been robbed ‘in the province’.------She held up a sign reading something along the lines of  “I have no money. Please support my travel.”------About an hour later
column10: she got a little money and went to buy something  in front of Chbar Ampov market. Source: Facebook
